Texts.Chs:
. 通过点击网格上的一个图标来选择一项研究。
您可以通过用鼠标左键拖动来导航网格。
点击左上角的按钮将视图移动到树的中心，
点击左边的按钮会打开一个研究列表，您可以从中缩放到其他研究。
Texts.Eng:
. Select a research by clicking one of the icons on the grid.
You can navigate the grid by dragging with the left mouse button.
The left button at the top left corner will move the view to the center of the tree, and the left button will open a list of researches, from which you can zoom to other researches.

Texts.Eng: Peerless Lunari

Texts.Eng: Select a Research

Texts.Eng: Silversmithing

Texts.Eng: Tritanium Alloy

Texts.Eng: Xithricite Crystal

Texts.Chs:
^orange;元素金属 - 5级^reset;

霓磷盐，菲洛合金和维奥合金都是相对值得寻找的高价值的资源，并且能够被锻造成非常有用的设备。
Texts.Eng:
^orange;Elemental Metals - Tier 5^reset;

Aegisalt, Ferozium and Violium are sought after resources of relatively high value, and are capable of being forged into very useful equipment.

Texts.Chs:
^orange;以太金属 - 8级^reset;

利用宇宙的本质，你可以把它形成一种新的物质形式，这种物质是专门为近乎完美而创造的。你已经掌握了所有关于这种艺术形式的知识。
Texts.Eng:
^orange;Impossible Metals - Tier 8^reset;

Harnessing the very essence of the cosmos, you are able to form it into a new form of matter specially created to be nearly perfect. You have mastered all there is to know about this artform.

Texts.Chs:
^orange;工业金属 - 3级^reset;

现在你可以使用^cyan;钛^reset;，通过它你可以升级你工作站。此外，你还将学习使用更多不同寻常的材料，如^cyan;原体岩^reset;和^cyan;半影岩^reset;(两者都非常有用)。
Texts.Eng:
^orange;Industrial Metals - Tier 3^reset;

Now you can work with ^cyan;Titanium^reset;, and through it you'll be able to upgrade many of your crafting stations. Furthermore, you'll learn to work with more unusual materials such as ^cyan;Protocite^reset; and ^cyan;Penumbrite^reset; (both of which are quite useful).

Texts.Chs:
^orange;多相金属 - 7级^reset;

你现在可以钻研那些违反物理定律的金属。任何超越这种材料的东西简直就是天方夜谭，事实上，你可以用它来制造，你现在比星系中几乎所有活着的金属工匠高一个台阶。
Texts.Eng:
^orange;Multi-Phasic Metals - Tier 7^reset;

You can now delve into metals that violate the very laws of physics. Anything beyond here is truly wonderous to behold, and the fact that you can work with it puts you a step above nearly every living metalsmith in the galaxy.

Texts.Chs:
^orange;航天时代金属 - 4级^reset;

耐钢是一种奇妙的材料。通过这种金属，你所有的制造台将能够进行最大程度的升级。你也会发现一套更有效的防守和进攻装备。
Texts.Eng:
^orange;Space-Age Metals - Tier 4^reset;

Durasteel is a fantastic material. Through this metal, all of your crafting tables will be able to upgrade to their maximum capacity. You'll also find a much more potent set of defensive and offensive gear.

Texts.Chs:
^orange;钢铁工人 - 2级^reset;

学习加工^cyan;钨^reset;和^cyan;月海矿^reset;，并把它们变成有用的设备。现在你可以获得更高质量的装备，并通过防御装备显著提高生存能力。
Texts.Eng:
^orange;Steelworker - Tier 2^reset;

Learn to process ^cyan;Tungsten^reset; and ^cyan;Telebrium^reset; and work it into useful equipment. This will grant access to higher quality gear and dramatically increase survivability through defensive gear.

Texts.Chs:
^orange;优势金属 - 6级^reset;

日耀，永燃，寒霜和超致密矿 都是高级的的金属，性能优秀，卓尔不凡。通过这些金属，你将能够锻造出奇妙的东西。
Texts.Eng:
^orange;Superior Metals - Tier 6^reset;

Solarium, Pyreite, Isogen and Densinium are all remarkable metals guaranteed to excel in their particular idiom. Through these metals you will be able to forge fantastic things.

Texts.Chs:
^orange;1级^reset;

最简单的金属材料，质地柔软，导电性强，^cyan;铜^reset;在大多数工业生产过程中仍然有用，这要归功于它在布线方面的要求。在^green;大多数世界^reset;你都能找到^cyan;铜^reset;，因为它在宇宙中极其丰富。

^orange;1级^reset;

通过你的科学研究，你已经发现了对过去的某种迷恋。您已经学习了考古学和人类学的基础知识，现在可以创建齿轮来帮助您发现化石和人工制品。你可以在你的发明者桌上制作化石站。要挖掘化石，你首先需要在地下的土壤中找到一些。一旦你这么做了，只需站在化石旁边，用你选择的化石刷瞄准它，然后刷它几秒钟。然后你将被带到 Fossil Minigame 进行技能测试挑战。

^orange;2.5级^reset;

学习处理被称为^cyan;月海^reset;的不寻常矿石。这种金属重量轻，导电性好，足以产生电荷，但不适合长期使用，月海已经在许多领域得到应用。你可以在卫星上找到月海，在那里可以看到大量形成的月海矿。

^orange;2级^reset;

随着对技术的更深入理解，你现在可以创造更有效的工具来获取化石。
Texts.Eng:
^orange;Tier 2^reset;

With firmer understanding of techniques, you can now create more efficient tools to procure fossils with.

Texts.Chs:
^orange;2级^reset;

你已经学会了将有机物质转化为可用的形式。你现在可以在熔炉里制作琥珀和硬化的粘液“宝石”。
Texts.Eng:
^orange;Tier 2^reset;

You've learned to smelt organic substances into usable forms. You can now make chunks of amber and hardened slime 'gems' at your furnace.

Texts.Chs:
^orange;3.5级^reset;

将几种金属结合在一起可以创造出更高级的合金类型。
Texts.Eng:
^orange;Tier 3.5^reset;

Combining several metals together allows you to create a superior type of alloy.

Texts.Chs:
^orange;3.5级^reset;

学习加工^cyan;半影矿^cyan;。你可以在^green;半影^reset;生物群落中找到半影矿。它在光线下闪闪发光，回到黑暗之后也会闪光几秒。它有一种暗淡的蓝光，使它即使在黑暗中也很容易被定位。

^orange;3级^reset;

虽然钚比铀要危险一些，但铀比前者难冶炼。铀在许多机器中具有高度的实用性，甚至可以用于武器装备。
Texts.Eng:
^orange;Tier 3^reset;

Though Plutonium is quite a bit more dangerous than Uranium, Uranium is somewhat harder to smelt. It has a high degree of usefulness in numerous machines and can even be worked into weaponry.

Texts.Chs:
^orange;3级^reset;

你可以创造出顶级的设备，甚至可以挖掘出最脆弱的化石残骸或古代埋藏的工艺品。
Texts.Eng:
^orange;Tier 3^reset;

You're able to create top of the line gear capable of unearthing even the most fragile of fossilized remains or ancient buried artifacts.

Texts.Chs:
^orange;4.5级^reset;

几乎没有什么金属能像超钛这样美丽，超钛是已知的最有效的合金之一。在它的表面之下，金色和乳白色的蓝色微条纹在随机的分形图案中起伏。视觉效果拉满。
Texts.Eng:
^orange;Tier 4.5^reset;

Few metals can look as beautiful as Tritanium, one of the most potent known alloys. Beneath its surface, subtly moving striations of gold and opalescent blue fluctuate in random fractal patterns. The effect is magical in appearance.

Texts.Chs:
^orange;4级^reset;

高密度金属，简直为真空量身打造，^cyan;耐刚^reset;是太空工程师的最爱。几乎所有的 ^green;4级^reset;世界都可以找到耐钢。^green;外星^reset;，^green;硫磺，^green;山脉^reset;都是很好的来源。

^orange;4级^reset;

学习处理^cyan;混乱原生质^reset;。

原始的混沌和熵赋予其形式，这种金属是独一无二的，绝对不是宇宙的自然部分。它在固态和非固态之间不断变化。它只存在于^green;腐化^reset;子生物群落中，其在许多类型的腐化世界地上地下被发现。

要处理这种稀有和不寻常的矿物，你至少需要^orange;生化实验台^reset;(从炼金工作台升级而来)以正确清洁有毒的外壳并清除杂质。一台^orange;高炉^reset;或^orange;电弧冶炼炉^reset;也可以自行处理。
Texts.Eng:
^orange;Tier 4^reset;

Learn to process ^cyan;Lasombrium^reset;. 

Raw chaos and entropy given form, this metal is unique and not a natural part of the universe. It phases between solid and non nearly constantly. It is only found in ^green;Corruption^reset; sub biomes, found on and beneath many types of decaying worlds.

To process this rare and unusual mineral, you'll need at least a ^orange;Chem Lab^reset; (upgrade of the Alchemy station) to properly cleanse the toxic outer shell and remove impurities. A ^orange;Blast Furnace^reset; or ^orange;Arc Smelter^reset; can also do the trick on their own.

^orange;Tier 4^reset;

Learn to process ^cyan;Prisilite^reset;. 

Prisilite is a truly interesting mineral. Capable of holding charge but not discharging it without an impact, it has been harnessed for many creative purposes across the galaxy.

You can find this chromatic crystal in many places, but ^green;Chromatic^reset; biomes are among the best places to hunt.

Texts.Chs:
^orange;4级^reset;

钻石作为装饰品被追捧的原因，是因为很少有人能够辨别出来，据说钻石是美丽(不要在意它们是无色和乏味的!).然而，钻石对于那些有能力充分利用它们的人来说是非常有用的。你能够做到这一点，并将能够做出非常有用的装备。
Texts.Eng:
^orange;Tier 4^reset;

Sought after as decorative for reasons few have ever been able to discern, diamonds are allegedly beautiful (nevermind the fact that they are colorless and bland!). However, diamond is exceptionally useful to those with the means to make the most of them. You're able to do just that, and will be able to make exceptionally useful gear.

Texts.Chs:
^orange;4级^reset;

虽然没有那么强的放射性，但镎有许多应用程序并不与铀共享。
Texts.Eng:
^orange;Tier 4^reset;

While not as radioactive, Neptunium has a number of applications that are not shared with Uranium.

Texts.Chs:
^orange;5.5级^reset;

在多道工序中融合维奥，菲洛和霓磷盐允许你制造一种超强的合金。
Texts.Eng:
^orange;Tier 5.5^reset;

Merging Violium, Ferozium and Aegisalt together allows the creation of a super-strong alloy useful in many processes.

Texts.Chs:
^orange;5级^reset;

学习处理^cyan;霓磷盐^reset;。你可以在任何^green;5级^reset;世界中找到^cyan;霓磷盐^reset;。

^orange;5级^reset;

学习处理^cyan;菲洛矿^reset;。你可以在任何^green;5级^reset;世界中找到^cyan;菲洛矿^reset;。

^orange;5级^reset;

学习处理^cyan;维奥矿^reset;。你可以在任何^green;5级^reset;世界中找到^cyan;维奥矿^reset;。

^orange;5级^reset;

除开天生的危险或不稳定，钍是一种相当有益的材料，能够创造性地使用在实验室。
Texts.Eng:
^orange;Tier 5^reset;

Not inherently dangerous or unstable, Thorium is quite a beneficial material when used creatively in a lab.

Texts.Chs:
^orange;5级^reset;

现在你可以创造更多的奇怪转换器，提供一些你可能不得不寻找的材料。
Texts.Eng:
^orange;Tier 5^reset;

You can create more exotic forms of Microformer now, providing access to a number of materials you may otherwise have had to hunt for.

Texts.Chs:
^orange;6级^reset;

将月晶做成巨大的一块，充满活力的能量脉络。
Texts.Eng:
^orange;Tier 6^reset;

Convert Lunari into a vastly superior form of itself, shot-through with potent veins of energy.

Texts.Chs:
^orange;6级^reset;

学习处理^cyan;日耀矿^reset;。你可以在任何^green;5级^reset;世界中找到^cyan;日耀矿^reset;。

^orange;6级^reset;

由于你在这方面的渊博学识，你们现在有能力用与氘和厄尔吉斯燃料在^orange;生化实验台^reset;处增强放铀和钚。这些同位素提供的放射性能量将远远超过以前。
Texts.Eng:
^orange;Tier 6^reset;

Thanks to your wealth of knowledge on this subject matter, you now have the ability to vastly improve Uranium and Plutonium by enhancing them with Deuterium and Erchius Fuel at your ^orange;Chem Lab^reset;. These isotopes will provide far more radioactive energy than before.

Texts.Chs:
^orange;6级^reset;

你完全不知道先驱是用什么创造出这种合金的，但至少你已经学会了如何使用它。
Texts.Eng:
^orange;Tier 6^reset;

You have absolultely no idea what the Precursors created this alloy from, but you've at least learned to work with it.

Texts.Chs:
^orange;7级^reset;

你已经学会了最大限度地利用同位素的力量，并且在这个过程中通过一两代人的努力提升了这个领域的知识。你已经学会了创造一种全新的同位素形式，其性质迄今为止尚未见过。
Texts.Eng:
^orange;Tier 7^reset;

You've learned to harness the power of isotopes to your utmost advantage and advanced the knowledge in this field by a generation or two in the process. You've learned to create an entirely new form of isotope with properties hitherto unseen.

Texts.Chs:
^orange;8级^reset;

你已经发明了一种全新的合金形式，而且没人敢声称在你之前就把其创造出来。
Texts.Eng:
^orange;Tier 8^reset;

You've invented an entirely new form of alloy, and none created before it can claim to be its rival.
